Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Rockwell
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Western, Foster, California and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Western, Foster, California, Lawrence and over regular route, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Rockwell.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
